settings.triple_line_text: Whether you have a question, need assistance, or wish to schedule a personalized styling session, our team is ready to help. Reach out to us, and we’ll ensure your Marushika experience is seamless and unforgettable.

settings.question: How can I determine my size when shopping online?
settings.answer: We offer personalised fitting for each of our wearable art pieces. These will be unique in design and unique to your fitting.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and secure payment options such as Apple, Google and PayPal for a seamless checkout experience.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: We offer a bespoke and personalized fitting service. You will receive updates from our team throughout the process and also have a dedicated contact to assist you at any point of the experience.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Our one-of-a-kind experience means that we only offer in-person services.

settings.question: How do I contact customer service?
settings.answer: You can reach our customer service team  through our form above. We strive to respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

settings.question: Can I receive notifications about upcoming products and collections?
settings.answer: Yes, sign up for our newsletter to receive updates on products, shows and collections. You can subscribe on our website's homepage.

settings.question: How do I care for my garments?
settings.answer: Care instructions are provided on each product page. Generally, we recommend following the care guidelines on the garment's label for optimal longevity.

settings.triple_line_text: Find quick answers to common questions about our showroom, shipping, returns, and more. If you can’t find what you’re looking for, feel free to reach out to us directly for assistance.
